name: Robo Adventures
description:
Pedrodem Game  present, Robo Adventures: Jump, run, shelter yourself from the rain and shake your power, for a small toy robot the rain is its worst enemy. Run as much as you can the house awaits you!

Ver.1.1

Fix_Bug Umbrella

If you Touch on ANDROID Robot you can play on your mobile in html (if supported)

If you touch on CREDIT you can see the credit

If you touch on STORY you can see the story

Thanks for play ;)
